name: Tethered (itch) (PaperBagOfficial)
description:
Switch between the ability to jump and the ability to shoot as you go through a labyrinth filled with puzzles and enemies. Use your mechanics to your advantage, like wall jumping and quickly teleporting the other character in front of you, to solve puzzles. 

Submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam.

(Disclaimer: the teleporting mechanic is a little broken for some reason and the music was compressed down)
